page.title: 14HOUSING IN STOCKTON
page.content: MOST HOUSING IS CONCENTRATED IN NORTON,WITH ISOLATED COTTAGES AND FARMSTEADS LOCATED ALONG THE SIDE ROADS.IN NORTON THERE ARE 86 DWELLINGS OF WHICH 54 WERE BUILT BEFORE 1914,8 BETWEEN 1914 & 1939,15 BETWEEN 1945 & 1965 AND 9 SINCE 1965. 61 OF THE HOUSES ARE OWNED BY APLEY ESTATE,8 BELONG TO NORTON HOUSE FARM, 7 LOCAL AUTHORITY & 1O ARE PRIVATELY OWNED DWELLINGS. WITHIN THE VILLAGE ARE A NUMBER OF LISTED PROPERTIES. A NUMBER ARE BOX FRAMED THATCHED COTTAGES DATING TO THE 17TH CENTURY,ONE HAS EVIDENCE OF WATTLE AND DAUB.OTHERS DATE FROM THE PERIOD AROUND 1867-1879 WHEN THE ESTATE WAS EXPANDING AND ARE BUILT IN A DISTINCTIVE ESTATE STYLE. WHAT NEW DEVELOPMENT HAS OCCURRED HAS BEEN "INFILLING" BETWEEN ESTABLISHED ROWS OF HOUSES.
